890490.name: Paper Shakespeare: The Merry War
890490.description:
Set in an alt-Elsinore Universe some time after the events of the first game, King Hamlet II has declared an election for class president! It's totally not a meaningless position and in no way will help students interact in the real world outside of school, but four candidates have appeared.

Meet four new characters, straight out of Shakespeare plays new and old. Experience an entirely new campaign that situates itself right into the pre-existing story. Play around with a modified version of the Gossip System for the Election Rounds.

Who will you help become class president?

To play this DLC:

- You must reach the REBOOT ending of the base game.
- Choose REBOOT MODE at the start of a new game
- Choose ALT-U.
